product_name: Sea to Summit Trek and Travel Shaving Cream - 3 fl. oz.
long_description: Compact and convenient, Sea to Summit Trek and Travel Shaving Cream offers a clean shave when you're on the go. Trek and Travel shaving cream is biodegradable and phosphate free; use a coin-size amount and work into a lather. Cream has a light green tea fragrance. 3 fl. oz. container is compliant with TSA carry-on luggage regulations.
short_description: Compact and convenient, Sea to Summit Trek and Travel Shaving Cream offers a clean shave when you're on the go.
